attributes.action: "Doz - Does campaign"  Abolition of small print in any legally enforceable agreement or contract
attributes.additional_details:
The E-Petition is intended to persuade Parliament to abolish small print from any legal document, agreement or contract so that any such document, agreement or contract containing any print smaller than Arial Font size 12 shall not be enforceable in law.
Too many people have suffered loss because of conditions hidden in dense blocks of small print which are difficult to read.
